item.title: This is how surface tension works to hold water in a glass
item.description: I show you how water can be held in a glass with a screen and some water

media:content.media:title: This is how surface tension works to hold water in a glass
media:content.media:description: I show you how water can be held in a glass with a screen and some water

item.title: Seeing quantum physics with razor blades
item.description: In this video I show you how to demonstrate the Uncertainty Principle with nothing more than a laser and razor blade

item.title: Examining the meteor that hit russia
item.description: The most valuable material isn’t from earth

item.title: Manipulating matter with light!
item.description: In this video I show you how to trap particles with focused light. I talk about light having momentum and how this experiment can hold particles in place using only light.

item.title: How a fan blade creates a laser beam
item.description: In this video I make a laser gun just like in star wars that shoots laser bullets that you can actually see.

item.title: How is the coin balancing every single time?
item.description: In this video I show you how to drop and flip a coin so that it lands on its side very time.

item.title: Can a drone fly underwater at all?
item.description: In this video I see if a non-waterproof drone can actually work and fly in de-ionized water! Since there are no ions in the water it should be non-conductive and the drone should still be able to work in the water and not short out! Will it actually work?

item.title: Carrying water in a sieve
item.description: In this video I show you how to carry water in a sieve using hydrophobicity

item.title: How to control lightning
item.description: Thanks to UpnaLab for sending the equipment for this video and allowing use of their footage.

item.title: I got my own Acme portable black hole
item.description: I show you my very own portable black hole made with IR flock sheet

item.title: Exploring complex magnetic liquid behavior
item.description: In this video I show you what happens when you bring a type II superconductor near ferrofluid that is in a magnetic field. Then I show you what happens when you pour a liter of ferrofluid on a giant neodymium magnet!

item.title: Real Inception Top
item.description: In this video I show you a top that "never" stops spinning. I talk about conservation of angular momentum and how this top can continue to spin.

item.title: Light bulbs in nitrogen
item.description: I see if the filament from an incandescent bulb can actually light up in liquid nitrogen.

item.title: Easy way to separate alcohol and water
item.description: I show you how to separate water and alcohol by using salt! I show you something called a polydensity bottle.

item.title: Transparent Metal
item.description: How to shine light through solid metal

item.title: This Gatorade hates light
item.description: I show you how to convert thionin to leucothionin through reversible oxidation

item.title: 30 marshmallows getting their souls sucked out
item.description: I put 30 marshmallows in a vacuum chamber

item.title: How to calm the waves of the ocean ​-​ Part I
item.description: To calm ocean waves, a small amount of oil can be spread on the water's surface to create a calming effect

item.title: Aerogel protects me from lava
item.description: I put aerogel in lava and then touch it
